nodes.text: Jwartek was an Ithorian Jedi Knight serving the Jedi Order during the time of the Galactic Republic.

A Force-sensitive Ithorian, Jwartek was inducted into the ranks of the Jedi Order. Over time, Jwartek was trained in the ways of the Force and eventually attained the rank of Jedi Knight. As a Knight, Jwartek studied as a Jedi Consular, pursuing the rare specialization of the Jedi artisan. As part of his studies, Jwartek improved his lightsaber, enhancing the original hilt with a fallen branch from an ancient tree.
